entry.title: Sunday: Light snow. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Light snow ending this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 33 this morning and minus 24 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 26 February 2023
